page.title: 10CHELFORD SCHOOL
page.content:
{CHELFORD SCHOOL At the front of the school there is one large window facing to the south. We are in the biggest room of the school. There are four rooms in the building a canteen, a library, a hall and a classroom. The infants, which is the smallest class,are in a prefabricated classroom.The hall is for religious assembly,P.E.,music,T.V. craft,drama, etc. The library has all kinds of books. There are science fiction,reading books and many reference books.
Although the school was founded before 1754,the present school building was erected in 1892.In the old days the boys had one end of the playground and the girls had the other end.There is a climbing frame at one end and at the other end there is a P.E. shed.
